issue.title: [Rust][DataFusion] TPC-H Query 22
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11543](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11543). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Fails with parser error for the syntax SUBSTRING(col FROM 1)

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11543?focusedCommentId=17281381) by Mike Seddon (MikeSeddonAU):*
I have added this in the Postgres string functions but if I put a link here the comment gets removed. It will need to be changed to the Postgres syntax:

substr('alphabet', 3, 2)

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11543?focusedCommentId=17281383) by Mike Seddon (MikeSeddonAU):*
See ARROW-11298 which has the implementation ready for review.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11543?focusedCommentId=17332376) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Migrated to github: https://github.com/apache/arrow-datafusion/issues/175
